head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BERMEJO, MARY P. (NEE CRAFA)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BERMEJO, MARY P. (NEE CRAFA)

block.p: BERMEJO-Mary P. (nee Crafa). Age 94, of St. Louis, MO. Formerly of Jamaica, LI, on February 27, 2002. Beloved wife of the late Manuel Bermejo, aunt of James and Robert Crafa. Alumna of the School of Pharmacy, Columbia University. Funeral Monday, March 4, Good Shepherd Church, Ferguson, MO. Memorials to Today and Tomorrow Foundation, 20 Archbishop May Dr, St. Louis, MO 63119.
